bibl.title: The Ptolemaic Ethnos.
bibl.note: Definition and different roles of what was known as ethnos in Egypt under the Ptolemies. How far may the categories of public and private be applied to the Ptolemaic ethnos and what was the nature of relations between ethne and the Ptolemaic state?

bibl.title: "Private Associations and the Public Sphere. Proceedings of a Symposium Held at the Royal Danish Academy of Sciences and Letters, 9-11 September 2010"

bibl.seg: Dorothy J. Thompson, The Ptolemaic Ethnos.

Vincent Gabrielsen & Christian A. Thomsen, Private Associations and the Public Sphere. Proceedings of a Symposium Held at the Royal Danish Academy of Sciences and Letters, 9-11 September 2010 = Scientia Danica. Series H, Humanistica, 8. Vol. 9 (Copenhagen, 2015) pp. 301-313.

Definition and different roles of what was known as ethnos in Egypt under the Ptolemies. How far may the categories of public and private be applied to the Ptolemaic ethnos and what was the nature of relations between ethne and the Ptolemaic state?
